project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a contact book application that allows users to manage their contacts through a terminal interface. Contacts will be stored in a JSON file.

task.name: Implement function to add a contact
Implement function to search for a contact
Implement function to update an existing contact
Implement function to delete a contact
Implement JSON file handling (reading and writing contacts)
Implement a terminal interface for user interaction
Write tests for each of the functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
